awd_titl_txt: Computer Applications to Enhance Inquiry-Oriented           Laboratory Instruction in Biology at a 2-Year College
awd_abstract_narration: Computer Applications to Enhance Inquiry-Oriented Instruction                   in Biology                                                                      The general problem of scientific-technical literacy as well as                 the enhancement of inquiry-oriented laboratory instruction in                   biology is addressed. Specific  goals are to increase                           scientific literacy, reasoning skills, and the number of                        students succeeding in introductory biology courses.  Also,                     these goals will be achieved by developing, evaluating and                      integrating into the curriculum a set of computer applications                  designed to reinforce biology concepts with laboratory                          activities.  Efforts will be focused on an introductory biology                 course at a 2-year college that serves a nontraditional                         undergraduate population.  Student populations will include                     more women, Hispanics, Native Americans and older students. The                 resultant inquiry-based model of laboratory instruction is also                 expected to be used as a model for computer technology in bio-                  science education.***//
